tr.td: Orphanage Without Borders is a volunteer organization aiming to create an impact in the life of children. Our purpose is to facilitate connections between orphanages and projects helping children in order to respond to their needs. We intend to use the existing resources and the power of organizations that already exist to help in specific areas. We believe that collaboration is the key to improve the life of depracated children and that the knowledge of existing resources is an enourmous asset to make help more efficient.
